replies.bodyText:
This does not work, because if the other recyclerview is empty on creation, the size of this one gets all messed up.
This is why I used a fixed size for the recyclerview, which will be deleted anyway in the next issue.
This is why I used a scrollview already in this issue. On older phones the buttons would be so small because the recyclerview does not have enough space, so I used a fixed size and a scroll view
replies.author: juliajulie95

timeline.bodyText: no need to hardcode the size, the old code is dynamic & handles it correctly!
